## Quality Checklist

Please confirm the resource meets these requirements:

- [ ] Resource is directly related to GitHub Agentic Workflows
- [ ] Link is publicly accessible and working
- [ ] Resource is well-documented
- [ ] Resource is actively maintained (updated within last year)
- [ ] I have searched and confirmed this is not already in the list
- [ ] I am not the author (or I've disclosed that I am)
